message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. Would you like to purchase it from me for $200?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Could you consider meeting me in the middle at $150?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $180. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. Can we discuss further?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go up to $180. I'd be willing to pay $140 for it. Can you consider that?
